data.name: textBox1.Text
data.value:
1. Acceptance of Terms By accessing or using LDB Studio ("KNA LDB STUDIO COMMUNITY 2025"), you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms of Service (ToS) and Privacy Policy. If you do not agree, you must discontinue use immediately.
2. Terms of Service
2.1 User Responsibility You acknowledge that:
You are solely responsible for your actions, content, and use of the Program.
You assume all risks associated with the Program’s use, including but not limited to technical errors, data loss, or unintended outcomes.
You will not use the Program for unlawful activities, harassment, intellectual property infringement, or to harm the Program or other users.
2.2 Disclaimer of Warranties The Program is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind, express or implied. We do not guarantee uninterrupted, error-free, or secure operation.
2.3 Limitation of Liability Under no circumstances shall KNA, its affiliates, or licensors be liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages (e.g., lost profits, data loss) arising from your use of the Program.
2.4 Indemnification You agree to indemnify and hold harmless KNA from claims, losses, or expenses (including legal fees) resulting from your misuse of the Program or violation of these terms.
2.5 Termination We reserve the right to suspend or terminate access to the Program at our discretion, without notice, for violations of these terms.
3. Privacy Policy
3.1 Data Collection
We collect limited anonymized and non-anonymized data for operational and marketing purposes, including:
Usage Data: Regions, frequency/duration of use, and features accessed.
Technical Data: IP addresses, device type, browser, and operating system.
3.2 Purpose of Data Use Your data is used to:
Monitor regional usage trends to improve marketing strategies.
Enhance Program functionality and user experience.
Troubleshoot technical issues and maintain security.
3.3 Data Sharing We do not sell your personal data. Aggregated, anonymized data may be shared with:
Third-party analytics services (e.g., Google Analytics) to evaluate marketing performance.
Law enforcement if required by applicable laws.
3.4 Data Retention Data is retained only as long as necessary for the purposes outlined in this policy.
3.5 User Rights You may:
Request deletion of your personal data by contacting us on our website.
Opt out of non-essential data collection (e.g., analytics cookies).
3.6 Security We implement industry-standard measures to protect your data, but absolute security cannot be guaranteed.
4. General Provisions Governing Law: These terms are governed by the laws of the United Kingdom.
Updates: We may revise these terms at any time. Continued use constitutes acceptance of changes.
Contact: Direct questions to our website.
